Uses of Class
peregrine.http.HttpClientWriter

Packages that use HttpClientWriter
peregrine.http A new and cleaner HTTP client that doesn't require an extra queue and uses isWritable correctly. 
peregrine.rpc Basic RPC client framework which uses JSON over HTTP to encode and decode messages sent over the wire - this is not meant to be used for high throughput messages but instead meant for control messages between workers and the controller. 
 

Uses of HttpClientWriter in peregrine.http
 

Subclasses of HttpClientWriter in peregrine.http
 class HttpPostMethod
          Client for performing an HTTP post.
 class HttpPutMethod
          Client for performing an HTTP post.
 class HttpWriteForwardWriter
          HTTP PUT implementation that uses write forwarding to also write data to secondary hosts.
 

Uses of HttpClientWriter in peregrine.rpc
 

Methods in peregrine.rpc that return HttpClientWriter

          Deprecated.
